messages.content:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Chief Attorney at Fey & Co.. My boss, and a very good defense attorney.
Character 1
Name: Larry Butz
Description: The defendant in this case. A likeable guy who was my friend in grade school.
Character 2
Name: Cindy Stone
Description: The victim in this case. A model, she lived in an apartment by herself.
Character 3
Name: Winston Payne
Description: The prosecutor for this case. Lacks presence. Generally bad at getting his points across.
Character 4
Name: Frank Sahwit
Description: Discovered Ms. Stone's body. Newspaper salesman who saw Larry flee the scene.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.
Evidence 1
Name: Cindy's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 7/31, 4PM-5PM. Cause of death: loss of blood due to blunt trauma.
Evidence 2
Name: Statue
Description: A statue in the shape of "The Thinker". It's rather heavy.
Evidence 3
Name: Passport
Description: The victim apparently arrived home from Paris on 7/30, the day before the murder.
Evidence 4
Name: Blackout Record
Description: Electricity to Ms. Stone's building was out from noon to 6 PM on the day of the crime.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: I was going door-to-door, selling subscriptions when I saw a man fleeing an apartment.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 1
Testimony: I thought he must be in a hurry because he left the door half-open behind him.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 2
Testimony: Thinking it strange, I looked inside the apartment.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 3
Testimony: Then I saw her lying there... A woman... not moving... dead!
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 4
Testimony: I quailed in fright and found myself unable to go inside.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 5
Testimony: I thought to call the police immediately!
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 6
Testimony: However, the phone in her apartment wasn't working.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 7
Testimony: I went to a nearby park and found a public phone.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 8
Testimony: I remember the time exactly: It was 1:00 PM.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 9
Testimony: The man who ran was, without a doubt, the defendant sitting right over there.
Person: Sahwit

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.

You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Chief Attorney at Fey & Co.. My boss, and a very good defense attorney.
Character 1
Name: Larry Butz
Description: The defendant in this case. A likeable guy who was my friend in grade school.
Character 2
Name: Cindy Stone
Description: The victim in this case. A model, she lived in an apartment by herself.
Character 3
Name: Winston Payne
Description: The prosecutor for this case. Lacks presence. Generally bad at getting his points across.
Character 4
Name: Frank Sahwit
Description: Discovered Ms. Stone's body. Newspaper salesman who saw Larry flee the scene.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.
Evidence 1
Name: Cindy's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 7/31, 4PM-5PM. Cause of death: loss of blood due to blunt trauma.
Evidence 2
Name: Statue
Description: A statue in the shape of "The Thinker". It's rather heavy.
Evidence 3
Name: Passport
Description: The victim apparently arrived home from Paris on 7/30, the day before the murder.
Evidence 4
Name: Blackout Record
Description: Electricity to Ms. Stone's building was out from noon to 6 PM on the day of the crime.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: You see, when I found the body, I heard the time.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 1
Testimony: There was a voice saying the time... It was probably coming from the television.
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 2
Testimony: Oh, but it was three hours off, wasn't it?
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 3
Testimony: I guess the victim must have been watching a video of a taped program!
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 4
Testimony: That's why I thought it was 1:00 PM!
Person: Sahwit
Testimony 5
Testimony: Terribly sorry about the misunderstanding...
Person: Sahwit

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.

You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Chief Attorney at Fey & Co.. My boss, and a very good defense attorney.
Character 1
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mia's little sister. Found bent over her sister's body, crying.
Character 2
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 3
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.
Character 4
Name: April May
Description: An eye witness to the events. Testifies that she saw Maya commit the murder.
Character 5
Name: Marvin Grossberg
Description: A veteran defense attorney, and Mia's mentor.
Character 6
Name: Bellboy
Description: Bellboy at the Gatewater Hotel.
Character 7
Name: Redd White
Description: An eye witness. CEO of the information gathering company, Bluecorp.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.
Evidence 1
Name: The Thinker
Description: The murder weapon. Looks like a statue, but it's actually a clock. Made by Larry Butz. Clock in the form of a statue. The clock's gears have been removed. Made by Larry Butz.
Evidence 2
Name: Glass Shards
Description: The broken remains of a glass light stand. Broken beyond all recognition.
Evidence 3
Name: Receipt
Description: A department store receipt with letters written in blood on the back. Receipt for a glass light stand. The date of purchase is the day before the murder.
Evidence 4
Name: Maya's Memo
Description: "A conversation I had with my sister is recorded on my cell phone."
Evidence 5
Name: Mia's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 9/5 at 9:00PM. Cause: single blunt force trauma. Death was instantaneous. Died from a blow by a blunt object. May have lived for a few minutes after being hit.
Evidence 6
Name: Maya's Cell Phone
Description: Holds a conversation between the Chief and Maya. Click here for details.
Evidence 7
Name: Wiretap
Description: Found in Miss May's hotel room.
Evidence 8
Name: Floor Plans
Description: The murder scene, the Fey & Co. Law Offices. [caption] The stand is blocked from view looking from the office.
Evidence 9
Name: May Testimony
Description: "The victim dodged an attack then ran to the right, but she was caught and struck."
Evidence 10
Name: Photograph
Description: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit A" are written in pencil.
Evidence 11
Name: Photograph
Description: On the back the words "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit B" are written in pencil.
Evidence 12
Name: Bellboy's Affidavit
Description: Describes the man who stayed with Miss May in the hotel on the night of the murder.
Evidence 13
Name: Newspaper Clipping
Description: Article about politician's suicide. The word "White" is written in pen at the top.
Evidence 14
Name: Mia's Memo
Description: A list of people's names in Mia's handwriting.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Let's see, it was about 9:00, I believe.
Person: White
Testimony 1
Testimony: I was quietly perusifying... er, that's "reading" to you, some papers by the window.
Person: White
Testimony 2
Testimony: Then I heard a bedlam coming from outside!
Person: White
Testimony 3
Testimony: Surprised, I turned to look at the building across the way.
Person: White
Testimony 4
Testimony: It was then I saw him: a spiky-haired man attacking a woman with long hair!
Person: White
Testimony 5
Testimony: Needless to say that man was none other than you, Mr. Lawyer!
Person: White
Testimony 6
Testimony: I called Miss May over at once. She, too, was surprised of course.
Person: White
Testimony 7
Testimony: The victim, she... she ran away, but you gave chase!
Person: White
Testimony 8
Testimony: The victim ran to the left, and you gave chase!
Person: White
Testimony 9
Testimony: Finally there was a terrible impaction! Then it was all over...
Person: White

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.

You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mia's little sister. Currently training to become a spirit medium.
Character 1
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.
Character 2
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 3
Name: Lotta Hart
Description: Claims to be a research student. She's camped out to photograph shooting stars.
Character 4
Name: Larry Butz
Description: A friend and former classmate. Also my first client. Often the cause of trouble.
Character 5
Name: Marvin Grossberg
Description: A veteran defense attorney, and Mia's mentor.
Character 6
Name: Robert Hammond
Description: The victim in this case. Also, the defense attorney in the DL-6 Incident.
Character 7
Name: Misty Fey
Description: Mia and Maya's mother, and a spirit medium. Disappeared after the DL-6 Incident.
Character 8
Name: Gregory Edgeworth
Description: Victim in the DL-6 Incident, 15 years ago. A defense attorney and Miles's father.
Character 9
Name: Manfred von Karma
Description: Veteran prosecutor who hasn't lost a case in his 40-year career. Edgeworth's mentor.
Character 10
Name: Old Caretaker → Yanni Yogi
Description: Caretaker of the boat rental shop in Gourd Lake Park. Thinks he runs a restaurant.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.
Evidence 1
Name: Popper
Description: A classic party noisemaker. Pull the string, it goes "bang". Not very clue-worthy.
Evidence 2
Name: Lotta's Camera
Description: Set to automatically take a picture when a loud noise is detected. Faces the lake.
Evidence 3
Name: Autopsy Report → Robert's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: sometime on the 24th or 25th. Cause: one bullet shot to the heart. Time of death: sometime on the 24th or 25th. Shot from approximately one meter away.
Evidence 4
Name: Lake Photo
Description: Taken automatically on 12/25 at 12:15 AM. Click here for details.
Evidence 5
Name: Gourdy Article
Description: Article about a monster sighted at Gourd Lake. Click here for details.
Evidence 6
Name: Misty Fey's Photo
Description: An old photograph. "DL-6 Incident - Exhibit A" is written on the back.
Evidence 7
Name: Edgeworth's Request
Description: Document proving Edgeworth's request for an attorney.
Evidence 8
Name: Overhead Map
Description: Overhead map of Gourd Lake. Click here for details.
Evidence 9
Name: Pistol Bullet
Description: Found in the victim's body. Fired from a 22-caliber pistol. Found in the victim's body. The ballistic markings match the murder weapon's barrel.
Evidence 10
Name: Pistol
Description: The murder weapon. 22-caliber. Fired 3 times. Bears prints from Edgeworth's right hand.
Evidence 11
Name: Lotta's Deposition
Description: "I heard two sounds like gunshots just after midnight on 12/25."
Evidence 12
Name: Missile
Description: A K-9 unit in training. Very cute, with shiny eyes.
Evidence 13
Name: Fishing Pole
Description: Detective Gumshoe's personal fishing pole. Sadly flimsy and of dubious utility.
Evidence 14
Name: Metal Detector
Description: Makes a noise when metallic objects are near. A useful detection device.
Evidence 15
Name: Air Tank
Description: An empty air tank. The valve is open, and a banner of flags is wrapped around it.
Evidence 16
Name: Second Lake Photo
Description: Shows an empty lake. Taken automatically on 12/24 at 11:50 PM.
Evidence 17
Name: Parrot
Description: The erstwhile companion of the boat rental shop caretaker. Answers to the name "Polly".
Evidence 18
Name: DL-6 Case File
Description: File on the DL-6 Incident. Click here for details.
Evidence 19
Name: DL-6 Incident Photo
Description: Photograph of the scene of the murder. Click here for details.
Evidence 20
Name: Letter from the Safe
Description: "Get your revenge on Miles Edgeworth." This note details the murder and set up.
Evidence 21
Name: DL-6 Bullet
Description: Taken from Gregory Edgeworth's heart. Still bears clear ballistic markings.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: That night, I was out in a boat on the lake.
Person: Butz
Testimony 1
Testimony: I was looking for something and I, er, found it.
Person: Butz
Testimony 2
Testimony: So I quietly slipped the boat back in at the rental shop dock.
Person: Butz
Testimony 3
Testimony: Then, just as I was thinking about going home, I heard this "bang"!
Person: Butz
Testimony 4
Testimony: I looked out over the lake, but I didn't notice the boat.
Person: Butz
Testimony 5
Testimony: So after I heard that single gunshot I went home.
Person: Butz

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.

You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant until a year ago. Now she's training to be a spirit medium.
Character 1
Name: Dr. Turner Grey
Description: The director of the Grey Surgical Clinic where the malpractice incident occurred.
Character 2
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ran away as soon as she saw me. A girl who is Maya's little cousin.
Character 3
Name: Morgan Fey
Description: Maya's aunt. She has a strange, powerful aura about her.
Character 4
Name: Lotta Hart
Description: Claims to be an investigative photographer. She lives for the next big scoop.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Ini Miney
Description: College student. A huge fan of the occult and is doing research in parapsychology.
Character 7
Name: Mimi Miney
Description: Died in a car accident 1 year ago. Was Ini's older sister, nurse at Dr. Grey's clinic.
Character 8
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister. She was a top notch lawyer and my mentor and friend forever.
Character 9
Name: Franziska von Karma
Description: Became a prosecutor in Germany at age 13. A prodigy who has never known defeat.
Character 10
Name: Ami Fey
Description: Kurain Channeling Technique founder. Legend says her soul is sealed in the Sacred Urn.
Character 11
Name: Director Hotti (purported)
Description: A peculiar patient who claims to be Director Hotti. Seems to be extremely "healthy".
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Guidemap (Fey Manor)
Description: A diagram of Fey Manor. Meditation room to the south. Channeling chamber north of meditation room. Side room to the east, have to go through winding path from meditation room to get to side room.
Evidence 2
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: Slightly translucent. It's small, but it has a deep, profound aura about it. Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.
Evidence 3
Name: Newspaper Clipping 1
Description: One year ago on May 2nd, 14 patients died from malpractice at Grey Surgical Clinic.
Evidence 4
Name: Folding Screen
Description: About 8 inches off the ground is a small hole that looks like a bullet hole.
Evidence 5
Name: Black Key
Description: An old steel key. A green jewel is set in the center of the key's grip.
Evidence 6
Name: Newspaper Clipping 2
Description: Mimi Miney, nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic, died after falling asleep at the wheel. Articles about the car accident. [info] This is a newspaper clipping about the death of Mimi Miney, the nurse who worked at Turner Grey's clinic. It reads how Mimi died as a result of her car crashing when she fell asleep at the wheel and Director Hotti fills in some further parts of the article later on. The content is as follows-Highway of Nightmares-May 24 - Late last night, two women's car crashed into a highway center divide. One of the women was not able to escape the flaming wreckage and died at the site. Ongoing investigation has revealed that the driver had fallen asleep at the wheel. -Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash, and like, I woke up in a huge sea of flames. I was like, still half-asleep, but I opened the right door and like, got out. I don't, like, remember anything else. -Doctor Lurking in the Shadows? If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney. Mimi Miney was the nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients were accidentally overdosed to their death. Is this then, just a mere coincidence...? 
Evidence 7
Name: Floor Plans (Crime Scene)
Description: A diagram of the Channeling Chamber. A four sectioned mat in front of a platform at the head.
Evidence 8
Name: Dr. Grey's Autopsy Report
Description: After being stabbed in the chest, he was shot in the forehead at point-blank. Stabbed in chest then shot at point-blank. Gunpowder residue around bullet hole.
Evidence 9
Name: Pistol
Description: Murder weapon. Was Grey's. Two shots fired. Bears Maya's and Grey's fingerprints.
Evidence 10
Name: Knife
Description: Murder weapon. A small fruit knife. Belongs to the Fey's. Bears Maya's fingerprints.
Evidence 11
Name: Maya's Costume
Description: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. There are blood splatters on it. Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. This is Maya's robe that she wore on the day of Turner Grey's murder. It is stained with blood splatter and a bullet hole is present in the sleeve. The robe is otherwise clean. It is purple in color.
Evidence 12
Name: Lotta's Photo 1
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. This is a photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot.
Evidence 13
Name: Lotta's Photo 2
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. [caption] This is the second photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot behind her. Maya Fey is standing, pistol in hand, wearing a blood-splattered robe.
Evidence 14
Name: Sacred Urn
Description: Ami Fey's spirit is sealed within. It's chipped and cracked all over. Broken by Pearl right before the murder. Under repair in the hallway until police came.
Pearl:
I found some glue and brought it to the hallway... and fixed the urn there.
Evidence 15
Name: Cloth Scrap
Description: Unburned remains found inside the garden incinerator. Small amount of blood is on it.
Evidence 16
Name: Pearl's Ball
Description: Pearl's favorite toy. She was playing with this at the time of the murder, it seems.
Evidence 17
Name: Clothing Box
Description: There is a hole that looks like a bullet hole about 8 inches off the ground.
Evidence 18
Name: License Photo
Description: Ini's photo for her driver's license. Director Hotti's treasured possession.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Like, the Side Room was, like, kinda dark, you know?
Person: Ini
Testimony 1
Testimony: So like, the costume is, like, purple, right? The blood totally blended right in.
Person: Ini
Testimony 2
Testimony: And I, like, persuaded my sister it wasn't, like, right to do something like that.
Person: Ini
Testimony 3
Testimony: And then... like, I took my sister to the Channeling Chamber.
Person: Ini
Testimony 4
Testimony: I, like, didn't see anyone on the way to, like, the Channeling Chamber.
Person: Ini

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.

You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.
Character 1
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.
Character 2
Name: Will Powers
Description: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.
Character 3
Name: Security Lady
Description: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.
Character 4
Name: Lotta Hart
Description: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Juan Corrida
Description: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.
Character 7
Name: Matt Engarde
Description: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
Character 8
Name: Adrian Andrews
Description: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.
Character 9
Name: Franziska von Karma
Description: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.
Character 10
Name: Celeste Inpax
Description: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
Character 11
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.
Character 12
Name: John Doe
Description: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...
Character 13
Name: Shelly de Killer
Description: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.
Evidence 2
Name: The Nickel Samurai
Description: A glossy photo Maya pushed onto me. A picture describing the nickel samurai costume.
Evidence 3
Name: Press Conference Ticket
Description: Seems like the Nickel Samurai is to confess something after the post-ceremony stage show.
Evidence 4
Name: Radio Transceiver
Description: Originally from the Bellboy. It can transmit and receive signals over great distances. Originally from Maya's kidnapper, who goes by the name of "De Killer".
Evidence 5
Name: Lotta's Camera
Description: A very expensive item valued at $1,600. It was stolen around the time of the murder. Stolen on the night of the murder. Tabloid article about the victim was in the case.
Evidence 6
Name: Hotel Guidemap
Description: Map of the Gatewater Hotel around the crime scene. A path from the west leads to the viola hall. To the north of the path is engarde and to the south corrida. East of viola hall is the lobby.
Evidence 7
Name: Guitar Case
Description: Found next to the victim. Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid. Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid. Bears only Corrida's fingerprints.
Evidence 8
Name: Wine Glass
Description: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. No sign it's been drank. Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.
Evidence 9
Name: Crime Photo
Description: Photo of Juan Corrida's murder scene. [caption] The victim sits on a chair in a samurai outfit. There is a knife sticking out of his chest. A glass of juice sits behind him on the dresser. A full bottle of juice sits on the desk in front of him. An open guitar case lies on the floor next to him. Next to the guitar case are the remains of a smashed vase that has stained the carpet with water.
Evidence 10
Name: Autograph
Description: Juan Corrida's autograph. "To my dearest Wendy" is written on it.
Evidence 11
Name: Magazine Clipping
Description: An "article" from the tabloid "Gossip Land". The contents of the article follow: *Jammin' Midnight Rendezvous!?*

A super-star in an ultra-hot, mega-secret
love scandal!?

Reliable sources say that Juan Corrida
has been getting in close with the
mysterious, yet beautiful manager to the
stars, Ms. A.A.!

Evidence 12
Name: Suicide Report
Description: Deceased: Celeste InpaxFound by: Juan CorridaWas her suicide note hidden?
Evidence 13
Name: Attempted Suicide Report
Description: Attempter: Adrian AndrewsReason: Shock from Celeste Inpax's suicide.
Evidence 14
Name: Juan's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 8:15 PMCause: Strangled to death with a scarf, then stabbed with a knife.
Evidence 15
Name: Knife
Description: Bears the victim's blood and Engarde's fingerprints. In the grip, "Gatewater" is engraved.
Evidence 16
Name: Jammin' Ninja's Button
Description: Was ripped from his costume. Is covered in Corrida's blood. Found in Engarde's "hakama".
Evidence 17
Name: Lotta's Photo
Description: Picture taken in the Hallway right after the murder. A person in samurai garb stands outside the door.
Evidence 18
Name: Picture Card
Description: Was placed next to the victim at the time of the murder. Ms. Andrews was carrying it.
Evidence 19
Name: Letter of Introduction
Description: Received from Edgeworth. Allows bearer to freely investigate the crime scene.
Evidence 20
Name: Matt's Note
Description: "Please feed my cat, Shoe. My house is just a little ways down from the hotel."
Evidence 21
Name: Spy Camera
Description: Set to record the victim's room from 8 PM for 1 hour. Was running at time of murder.
Evidence 22
Name: Transmitter
Description: Changes the footage taken by the spy camera into radio waves and transmits the data.
Evidence 23
Name: Stuffed Bear
Description: The spy camera was set in its right eye. Found in the victim's room.
Evidence 24
Name: Credit Card Receipt
Description: A receipt for $3,800. Proof Engarde bought a stuffed bear identical to one in evidence.
Evidence 25
Name: Figurine
Description: A wooden bear-shaped figurine. It's covered in many thin cuts. A wooden puzzle with a hollow inside. Only Corrida and Andrews know how to open it.
Evidence 26
Name: Celeste's Photo
Description: Found at Engarde Mansion. "With Love... Celeste" is written on it.
Evidence 27
Name: Celeste's Suicide Note
Description: Found inside the Figurine. It tells of Engarde's horrible misdeeds.
Evidence 28
Name: Pistol
Description: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> A small caliber pistol that is thought to have been fired by De Killer at Franziska.
Evidence 29
Name: Video Tape
Description: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> One of the items retrieved. De Killer violently tried to recover it. Contents unknown.
Evidence 30
Name: Bellboy's Uniform
Description: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.<if asked for details> Worn by De Killer on the night of the murder. One of its special buttons is missing.
Evidence 31
Name: Whip
Description: Thrown away by Franziska von Karma, it has a certain mysterious nostalgia to it.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: That glass of juice... I didn't really pour it for myself.
Person: Andrews
Testimony 1
Testimony: I was surprised when I walked into the room and saw it in that messy state.
Person: Andrews
Testimony 2
Testimony: And Juan... He was sitting slumped over and tired-looking in the corner.
Person: Andrews
Testimony 3
Testimony: When I saw him sitting like that, the thought that he was dead didn't cross my mind.
Person: Andrews
Testimony 4
Testimony: To be honest, I thought he had just fainted or something. So I went to pour him some juice.
Person: Andrews
Testimony 5
Testimony: When I realized that he was dead... That's when I knocked the flower vase over.
Person: Andrews

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.

You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: Me. What more can I say? This is my third year as a young (but skilled!) lawyer.
Character 1
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.
Character 2
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.
Character 3
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.
Character 4
Name: Adrian Andrews
Description: Head of planning, promotion, and security of the Treasures of Kurain Exhibit.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Mask☆DeMasque
Description: A flashy thief who steals valuable works of art. Sends a calling card before a heist.
Character 7
Name: Luke Atmey
Description: An Ace Detective. Has great powers of deduction, yet rarely makes sense.
Character 8
Name: Ron DeLite
Description: A young man who turned himself in as Mask☆DeMasque. A bit of a pitiful guy.
Character 9
Name: Desirée DeLite
Description: Ron DeLite's wife. Seems to be a very friendly and out-going lady.
Character 10
Name: Larry Butz
Description: My friend. I've known this trouble magnet ever since grade school.
Character 11
Name: Godot
Description: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.
Character 12
Name: Kane Bullard
Description: CEO of KB Security. His body was found inside his safe.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.
Evidence 2
Name: Treasure Exhibit Poster
Description: A poster for the Treasures of Kurain exhibit. The Sacred Urn of Kurain Village will be displayed in Lordly Tailor.
Evidence 3
Name: Ami Fey's Golden Statue
Description: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Is holding the Shichishito. A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Moved the night of the crime. Carried into the basement warehouse the day of the crime. Moved again that night.
Evidence 4
Name: Sacred Urn
Description: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, it looks like a plain old pot. One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, but has no monetary value. Found in the office of Luke Atmey. Has pink splotches all over it. Found in Atmey's Office. Covered in pink splotches, but it's the genuine article. Broken and repaired by Adrian 2 weeks ago, then replaced in its box. Kept out of sight.
Evidence 5
Name: DeMasque's Calling Card
Description: Sent before a heist, the emblem is top-secret. Click here for details.
Evidence 6
Name: Shichishito
Description: A ceremonial sword held in the hand of Ami Fey's statue. Wasn't bent before the crime. DeMasque knocked Atmey out during the crime w/ a blow to the back of the head.
Evidence 7
Name: Camera Data
Description: The warehouse camera went off at around 1 AM on the night of the crime.
Evidence 8
Name: Desirée's Letter
Description: Addressed to her husband Ron DeLite. Apparently contains something important.
Evidence 9
Name: Security Camera Photo
Description: Photo of storeroom entrance taken by the camera. Click here for details.
Evidence 10
Name: Blackmail Letter
Description: Written with a fountain pen. Found in Ron's room. Click here to read. Found in Ron DeLite's room. Written by Bullard. Click here to read.
Evidence 11
Name: Ron's Wallet
Description: Found by Larry at his part-time security job's company building (night of the crime).
Evidence 12
Name: Key Card
Description: Found inside Ron's wallet. Apparently used for the building of his part-time job. Found in Ron's wallet. Opens the KB Security CEO's office. Leaves a record when used. Found in Ron's wallet. Used on October 12th, the night of the crime, at 1 AM.
Evidence 13
Name: Publicity Photo
Description: A shot of Mask☆DeMasque striking a pose. Click here for details.
Evidence 14
Name: DeMasque's Broach
Description: Found in the shadow of Ami Fey's statue. Looks like it was torn off of some clothing.
Evidence 15
Name: Kane's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 10/12 at 1 AM. Cause: Cerebral hemorrhaging from blunt trauma to the head.
Evidence 16
Name: Newspaper Clipping
Description: An article on Mask☆DeMasque's first heist. Click here for details. About first heist. Guard in photo is Ron DeLite. Click here for details.
Evidence 17
Name: CEO Office Buzzer
Description: Connected to the basement Security Guard Office. There are no fingerprints on it.
Evidence 18
Name: Kane's List
Description: Found on a table at the crime scene. Click here for details.
Evidence 19
Name: Buzzer Record
Description: The buzzer went off once at 1:02 AM on October 12 in the CEO's office.
Evidence 20
Name: Ron's Testimony
Description: From DeMasque's 2nd heist on, he was stealing as directed by blackmail letters.
Evidence 21
Name: Urn Box
Description: A wooden box that had the Sacred Urn in it. Has pink paint stains on it.
Evidence 22
Name: Paint Marks
Description: Completely dry. The box of the Sacred Urn fits in the gap perfectly. When Adrian dropped the urn's box 2 weeks ago she also knocked over some paint.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Mask☆DeMasque is a master thief that first started his crime spree 6 months ago.
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 1
Testimony: He's so confident that he sends his calling card before he even commits the crime!
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 2
Testimony: This was his fifth heist, and as usual, he sent a card on to Lordly Tailor.
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 3
Testimony: His pattern is to always go after only the most precious art pieces.
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 4
Testimony: That's why we're sure it was Mask☆DeMasque, sir. It fits his M. O. to a T!
Person: Gumshoe

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
